original_title: President inaugurates new District Secretariat in Thiraimadu
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has inaugurated the new District Secretariat in Thiraimadu, Batticaloa, a short while ago, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
The new District Secretariat building was built at a cost of Rs. 1,055 million, according to the PMD.
